name: The Cryptic Caper
description:
Log Line:

On Halloween night, a group of cryptids plan a daring heist on Area 51 to destroy evidence of their existence. 

Content Warnings:

Depictions of cartoon violence and implications of death. 

This game was made for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Game Jam! 

Team Members: Josephine King

Press escape to pause!
